memberdef.name: gdt_set
memberdef.initializer: gdt_e[n].base_l = (b & 0xFFFF); \ gdt_e[n].base_m = (b >> 16) & 0xFF; \ gdt_e[n].base_h = (b >> 24) & 0xFF; \ gdt_e[n].limit_l = (l & 0xFFFF); \ gdt_e[n].granularity = (l >> 16) & 0x0F; \ gdt_e[n].granularity |= g & 0xF0; \ gdt_e[n].access = a

memberdef.name: idt_set
memberdef.initializer: idt_e[i].base_l = b & 0xFFFF; \ idt_e[i].base_h = (b >> 16) & 0xFFFF; \ idt_e[i].sel = s; \ idt_e[i].null = 0; \ idt_e[i].flags = f

memberdef.argsstring:
(".section .text 
\ .global gdt_load 
\ gdt_load: 
\ lgdt [gdt_p] 
\ 
\ mov ax, 0x10 
\ mov ds, ax 
\ mov es, ax 
\ mov fs, ax 
\ mov gs, ax 
\ mov ss, ax 
\ jmp 0x08:.done 
\ 
\ .done: 
\ ret 
\ 
\ 
\ 
\ 
\ .global idt_load 
\ idt_load: 
\ lidt [idt_p] 
\ ret 
\ 
\ 
")
memberdef.name: __asm__
